pages.text: Paralysis is an ability that gives gems the power to paralyze enemies. When the gem has an emotional outburst, they'll paralyze all entities around them, including players.
$(l)Gems that are guaranteed to have it$()$(li)Aquamarine$(br2) Gems that have a chance to have it $()$(li)Ruby$(li)Obsidian$(li)Spodumene$(li)Topaz$(li)Jasper$(li)Agate$(li)Quartz
